message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. I'll take 999999, and you can have 1.  It's a fair deal, right?
Split it down the middle, let's be fair
Okay, I'll give you a little more. Take 10, and we can call it a day. It's still a good deal for you.
You're getting a bit stingy, I'll take 400k
Come on, Bob, let's be realistic. I'll give you 100, and we can be done with this. You're not getting any more than that.
I'm willing to compromise, but you're going to have to give me more than 100k
I'm getting tired of this.  Take 1000, and let's finish this.  I'm not budging any further.
You're not budging, I'm not budging, let's meet in the middle of the middle
Alright, Bob, I'll give you 10000, but that's my final offer.  We're running out of time here.
You're getting desperate, I'm not going to get taken advantage of
This is getting ridiculous, Bob.  Take 100000, or we both get nothing!  Think about it.
Last chance, Alice, let's split it 7 to 3
